sourcesContent:
<template>
  <v-calendar
    v-model="selectedDate"
    :events="events"
    :event-color="getEventColor"
    :event-overlap-mode="mode"
    :event-overlap-threshold="30"
    :type="type"
    :weekdays="weekdays"
    @change="fetchEvents"
  >
  </v-calendar>
</template>

<script>
export default {
  data() {
    return {
      selectedDate: new Date(),
      events: [
        {
          name: "Meeting",
          start: "2023-05-01T10:30:00",
          end: "2023-05-01T12:30:00",
          color: "blue"
        },
        {
          name: "Lunch",
          start: "2023-05-01T12:00:00",
          end: "2023-05-01T13:30:00",
          color: "green"
        },
        {
          name: "Conference",
          start: "2023-05-02T12:30:00",
          end: "2023-05-03T16:30:00",
          color: "purple"
        }
      ],
      mode: "stack",
      type: "month",
      weekdays: [
        "Sunday",
        "Monday",
        "Tuesday",
        "Wednesday",
        "Thursday",
        "Friday",
        "Saturday"
      ]
    };
  },
  methods: {
    getEventColor(event) {
      return event.color;
    },
    fetchEvents(start, end) {
      // Fetch events for the selected range and update the events array
      // based on the response
    }
  }
};
</script>
